body_html:
Thanks for pointing this out @IvanUkhov - this was a silly oversight on my part.
I will have this fixed in HEAD shortly, however we're unlikely to merge that into the release branch for 0.11.

Once a release branch is cut, we try to avoid merging changes that don't fix a breaking bug in order to prevent release delays. Since this is a naming change of functions barely used yet, it probably isn't worth holding up the release for it.

body:
Thanks for pointing this out @IvanUkhov - this was a silly oversight on my part.
I will have this fixed in HEAD shortly, however we're unlikely to merge that into the release branch for 0.11. 

Once a release branch is cut, we try to avoid merging changes that don't fix a breaking bug in order to prevent release delays. Since this is a naming change of functions barely used yet, it probably isn't worth holding up the release for it.
